trends: There have been no other sightings in Flemington
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsfor the last week or so i have seen a large,star like object hovering close to my house in the night sky.it hovers there for hours..then when i look again its gone.the other night i was watching it like i do almost every night and it started to move , slowly at first,,then it took off overhead towards the east at a very high speed.i also have been seeing smaller objects usually about 4 or 5 near the larger object.they are starlike but have flickering lights that look white and pink\red.they move in circles, up and down.they go back and forth and sometimes cross each others path.after the larger object left they remained.at first when i first noticed these objects i thought they were weather balloons and the larger object was a star or planet.when i witnessed the large object actually move i was in shock.whty would it hover for hours then just take off.the small objects dont just float like balloons..they change directions rapidly.i am curious,scared, worried and amazed all at the same time.
Summary: one large object hovered for hours then took off rapidly.4 smaller ones moved all over near the big one.
